message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I can only afford to pay $100. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $110. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
